import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {ImCross} from 'react-icons/tb' const Game = ({ p1, p2, showForm }) => { const [scoreP1, setScoreP1] = useState(0); const [scoreP2, setScoreP2] = useState(0); return ( true && (
Rajdeep - {scoreP1}
Zara - {scoreP2}
) ); }; export default Game;
